name: Jacob Dupuis
text: Had a great experience getting our dog Ellie groomed by Pristine Pets Mobile Pet Spa. Austin was right on time for our appointment, discussed what services were being done, and finished in a good amount of time. In the past, weâ€™ve always taken our dog to a brick and mortar grooming place, but having them come to us was awesome and very convenient. We will definitely be using their services again, and I would highly recommend them to anyone.
